channel.title: [Non-Deltascape]Help
channel.description: I was wondering how do u make it so ::home can go into the emotes or in the spellbook??

item.title: [Non-Deltascape]Help
item.dc:creator: @lilwermscape_ftw lilwermscape_ftw
item.description:
@lilwermscape_ftw wrote:

open client.java
press ctrl f and look for “case 168:” without the quotes.

if you already see this:

case 168: if(teleblock == true){ sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); } else { customCommand("home"); }
Then you should be good. if not, add that case under case 130.
That is command that tells the first emote tab what to do.

now open up TextHandler.java
What ever your first emote tab says, search for that.

example, if the first tab says “yes” (<-- delta i think), look for the word yes,

you should come up with this:

p.sendFrame126("yes", 180);

change it to “home”.

save and compile

thats how its like on my server, urs may be different so keep trying and good luck

Read full topic
